nodes.text: Star Wars: Age of Rebellion Core Rulebook

Star Wars: Age of Rebellion Core Rulebook is the primary guide to Fantasy Flight Games' Star Wars: Age of Rebellion Roleplaying game. It is 464 pages in length and includes an introductory campaign, Perlemian Haul. The Core Rulebook was released on July 3, 2014.

“You're part of the Rebel Alliance and a traitor.”
–Darth Vader

Take on the sinister Galactic Empire as a member of the Rebel Alliance. Wage guerrilla warfare across the Star Wars galaxy as a soldier, or provide crucial intelligence to the Rebels as a cunning spy. Face down legions of stormtroopers, steal secret plans and restricted codes, and stay on target in the fight against the ultimate power in the universe. No matter what role in the Rebellion you take, the fate of the galaxy rests in your hands.
The Star Wars®: Age of Rebellion™ Core Rulebook provides everything you and your friends need to become heroes of the Rebel Alliance.
